body.name: 2 Pcs Kitchen Knife, Stainless Steel Chef Knife Set, Includes 8 inch Chef knife, 4 inch Parring Knife and Two Matched Knife Sheath, Sharp Knives with Ergonomic Handle, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 29 mins
features: 1. Uncompromising Precision: Our 8 inch chef’s knife boasts a razor-sharp stainless steel blade that effortlessly glides through vegetables, meats, and more. The balanced design of this chef knife set ensures optimum control, making chopping, slicing, and dicing a seamless chore.

2. Versatile Paring Power: The 4-inch paring knife is your ultimate detail-oriented tool. From delicate peeling to intricate garnishing, this knife's precise blade empowers you to create stunning presentations and fine-tuned dishes.

3. Chic Pink Aesthetic: Embrace your inner culinary artist with the elegantly designed pink handles. Inspired by the timeless charm of pink hues, these kitchen knives not only add a pop of color to your kitchen but also reflect your unique personality.

4. Safety First: We prioritize your safety as much as your cooking passion. That's why we've included two matched knife sheaths to protect your knives blade and keep them safely stored when not in use. Feel confident in your kitchen, knowing that your knifes are secure and your fingers protected.

5. What You Get: 8 inch chef Knife, 4 inch paring knife, two matched knife sheath and friendly customer service. Searching for the perfect gift for a cooking enthusiast? Look no further. Our sharp cooking knife is an ideal present for birthdays, weddings, or any occasion that calls for culinary celebration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Found a bargain when I found these! I love that the handles and sheaths are hot pink. I can cut up my veggies in style lol. Also, both knives are very sharp and feel good in my hand. And wow what a great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. Sharp and sturdy. Love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent knives at a good price
reviews.reviewText: These knives do the job. They come sharp, have protectors so you don't accidentally slice yourself if they're in a drawer, are bright pink and the tang/shank goes all the way down the handle, which makes a nice knife. The handles are plastic and fairly comfortable in the hand but I have other knives that are way more comfortable and a few that are not. I got these because they are pink. My husband and my son have a tendency to use my knives and they won't touch these because they're hot pink (the same reason I always buy hot pink lighters, no one steals them). These would be good for someone going into a first apartment, for a furnished rental (VRBO or Airbnb). I can't speak to how long they stay sharp but so far I've been cutting stuff like chicken, beef and veggies with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holding an edge
reviews.reviewText: Very sharp edges initially and we've used these for several months with no noticeable wear or loss of edge sharpness. The blade guards are easy to remove and easy to clean. The handle material is hard so they tend to be slippery when wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS KNIFE SET
reviews.reviewText: I'm an Amazon Vine Reviewer = love this knife set - my new favorites. Sharp and perfectly sized. So easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and multi-functional
reviews.reviewText: These knives are attractive and multi-functional. They were a bit dull so I'd recommend either sharpening them immediately or using them to cut softer foods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These knives are nice. They arrived very sharp and are comfortable to use. The handles are a slick material but I wouldn’t say it is causing a safety issue. And they are a fun color, which my daughters have loved when they get to help me in the kitchen. I would recommend these knives, especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely sharp but handle slippery
reviews.reviewText: I love how easily these knives just slice straight through my tomatoes without leaving a seedy wet mess behind. My old knife must've been more dull than I realized as these knives slice and dice without any indent or pressure and that's a huge help when it comes to prepping meals and when eating those meals. I did cut myself the first time using due to using this knife like I was used to with the dull knife- too much force not enough paying attention. If I skipped with the old knife no big deal. This knife however is so sharp that it was a big deal when I cut myself . I don't like the handle as it's hard to get a steady good strong grip and when I'm cooking my hands get greasy or wet and it's hard to not have them slipping down the handle. So that's the one and only con I experienced. I like the protective covering as that's a big safety feature that makes it convenient to put in and take out of the silverware drawer without cutting your hand.
